thread.title: Assistant Athletic Trainer - College Sports

title: Assistant Athletic Trainer - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Assistant Athletic Trainer   The Asst Athletic Trainer is responsible for managing or assisting the Head Athletic Trainer with the organization, management, and development of the sports medicine / athletic training program.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
